DOC.brief_title: Pregnancy Complications - A Probiotic Interventional Study
DOC.detailed_description: The main Project determine dietary supplementation intake probiotic associate decreased risk spontaneous preterm delivery preeclampsia randomize Clinical trial . Investigators also want investigate relationship intake probiotic degree inflammation different compartment pregnancy see probiotic component affect inflammatory state woman .
DOC.criteria: Maternal age > = 18 Singleton pregnancy Nulli multiparous without maternal intercurrent disease pregnant woman history spontaneous preterm delivery pregnant woman history preeclampsia . Exclusion Criteria Multiple pregnancy Gestational age > 17+6 week first visit Chronic intermittent disease ( e.g . diabetes mellitus , systemic lupus erythematosus , rheumatoid arthritis , Chron disease , ulcerative colitis ) Uterus malformation Immunomodulatory medication Hormonal treatment ( e.g . crinone , progesterone ) Subject disagree stop intake product contain probiotic study time . Subject unable provide write informed consent
